articles.description: Red Bull's team principal Christian Horner is cleared of inappropriate behaviour towards a female colleague following an internal investigation.
articles.title: Christian Horner allegations: Red Bull team principal cleared of inappropriate behaviour

articles.description: As Chelsea get set to face Leeds in the FA Cup fifth round, BBC Sport looks back at the notoriously ferocious 1970 FA Cup final replay between the two sides.
articles.title: The most brutal game in English football history

articles.description: Former Manchester United defender John O'Shea has been appointed interim head coach of the Republic of Ireland.
articles.title: O'Shea named interim Republic of Ireland head coach

articles.description: Crystal Palace centre-back Marc Guehi is ruled out for up to eight weeks after undergoing knee surgery.
articles.title: Palace's Guehi out for up to eight weeks after surgery

articles.description: Great Britain's two-time gold medallist Andy Murray wants to compete at another Olympic Games before he retires.
articles.title: Andy Murray wants to play in Olympic Games before retirement

articles.description: England wing Immanuel Feyi-Waboso will miss the three-day training camp in York this week because of a university medical exam.
articles.title: Feyi-Waboso to miss England training camp for exam

articles.description: The venues for the new annual three-tiered global women's tournament WXV have been announced for 2024, with Canada the hosts for WXV 1.
articles.title: Canada to host 2024 WXV 1 series

articles.description: Erling Haaland delivers an emphatic and ominous warning to Manchester City's rivals after scoring five goals in their 6-2 win at Luton in the FA Cup.
articles.title: 'We are coming' – 'machine' Haaland predicts 'exciting times'

articles.description: Spain's Jenni Hermoso says "football continues to give me life" six months on from winning the World Cup, when former Spanish federation chief Luis Rubiales kissed her.
articles.title: Football continues to give me life - Hermoso

articles.description: Bayern want Liverpool defender Andy Robertson to replace Alphonso Davies, Arsenal's search for a striker goes on, plus more.
articles.title: Bayern target Robertson - Wednesday's gossip
